ResourceHeader.ResourceName: STEREO SECCHI Cor2 telescopes P0 FITS files

RevisionEvent.Note: STEREO SECCHI: Initial SPASE XML resource description submission. Metadata submitted by A. Vourlidas on 2022-02-19, reviewed by LFB

Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. Corrected typo in Resource ID (Brightness). ZCB
Updated PublishedBy name to match ROR Registry. ZCB
Added MetadataRightsList and RightsList(s). Updated to 2.7.1. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: Total Brightness data from STEREO SECCHI, Sun Earth Connection Coronal and Heliospheric Investigation, Cor2 telescopes at 1 hr cadence (except for special observing campaigns) and full resolution (2048Â²). The data are generally available within about three days.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please note that all of the SECCHI data is free for public use, but if you use them in presentations, published work, websites, etc, please give the appropriate image credits ("STEREO/SECCHI" will usually suffice).

PublicationInfo.Authors: Howard, R.A., J.D. Moses, A. Vourlidas, et al.

InformationURL.Name: SECCHI Instrument Publication
InformationURL.Description: The SECCHI instrument paper has general information on data products: Howard, R.A., J.D. Moses, A. Vourlidas, et al., Sun Earth Connection Coronal and Heliospheric Investigation (SECCHI). Space Sci. Rev., 136, 67, 2008. (https://doi.org/10.1007/s11214-008-9341-4)
